name.description: Unique name or ID of this section.
name.comment: If used as a page section, ideally should be page path with slashes converted to dots, plus hash ('#'), plus unique CSS-compatible identifier (for HTML element ID), e.g. 'help.faq#how_do_i_setup_account'. If is a Search Info Header, should be URL-compatible so can request e.g. search-info-header.WorkflowRun --> '/static-section/search-info-header.WorkflowRun'.
name.title: Unique Identifier

___default_open.description: Whether this StaticSection should appear as expanded by default (in places where it may be collapsible). Does not necessarily depend on 'collapsible' being true, e.g. in lists where all sections are explicitly collapsible.
___default_open.title: Is Expanded by Default

___collapsible.description: Whether this StaticSection should be collapsible (wherever collapsibility is an option). This property is ignored in some places, e.g. lists where all sections are explicitly collapsible.
___collapsible.title: Is Collapsible

___image.description: Image or screenshot URL for this Item to use as a preview.
___image.title: Preview Image

___title_icon.description: Icon to be showed next to title in selected places.
___title_icon.title: Title Icon

contributing_labs.description: Other labs associated with the submitted data.
contributing_labs.title: Contributing Labs

items.description: A lab that has contributed to the associated data.
items.title: Contributing Lab

___link.description: Another link with which this resource is associated with or should redirect to.
___link.title: Link/URI

___image.description: Image or screenshot URL for this Item to use as a preview.
___image.title: Preview Image

___collapsible.description: Whether this StaticSection should be collapsible (wherever collapsibility is an option). This property is ignored in some places, e.g. lists where all sections are explicitly collapsible.
___collapsible.title: Is Collapsible

___yaxisCols.description: For filetype:csv, which columns (ints) should be used for Y-axis.
___yaxisCols.title: (CSV) Columns for Y-Axis

___titleCell.description: For filetype:csv, which table cell [row int, column int] to use to grab title of section/table.
___titleCell.title: (CSV) Title Cell

___filetype.description: What type of file or content is contained. If not set, HTML or format of file (if any) is used.
___filetype.title: File Type

___title_icon.description: Icon to be showed next to title in selected places.
___title_icon.title: Title Icon

___default_open.description: Whether this StaticSection should appear as expanded by default (in places where it may be collapsible). Does not necessarily depend on 'collapsible' being true, e.g. in lists where all sections are explicitly collapsible.
___default_open.title: Is Expanded by Default

___skipRows.description: For filetype:csv, which table rows (ints) to skip in table (e.g. due to blank rows).
___skipRows.title: (CSV) Rows Skipped

___xaxisRows.description: For filetype:csv, which rows (ints) should be used for X-Axis.
___xaxisRows.title: (CSV) Rows for X-Axis

___startCell.description: For filetype:csv, from which [row integer, column integer] to start parsing table.
___startCell.title: (CSV) First Table Cell

___body.description: Plain html or text content of this section.
___body.comment: There should be no 'file' if this is set.
___body.title: Raw Body

___section_type.description: What this section is used for. Defaults to 'Page Section'.
___section_type.title: Section Type

___file.description: Source file to use for populating content. Is superceded by contents of 'body', if one present.
___file.comment: There should be no 'body' if this is set.
___file.title: Source File Location
